data.lyric:
[ti:God's Country]
[ar:State Of Mine/Drew Jacobs]
[al:God's Country]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]God's Country - State Of Mine/Drew Jacobs
[00:09.83]Composed by：Blake Shelton
[00:19.66]Right outside of this one church town
[00:22.54]There's a gold dirt road to a whole lot of nothin'
[00:25.85]Got a deed to the land but it ain't my ground
[00:29.25]This is God's country
[00:32.70]
[00:33.28]We pray for rain and thank him when it's fallen
[00:36.30]'Cause it brings the grain and a little bit of money
[00:39.60]We put it back in the plate
[00:41.49]I guess that's why they call it God's country
[00:46.87]I saw the light in a sunrise
[00:49.84]Sittin' back in a 40 on the muddy riverside
[00:53.64]Gettin' baptized in holy water and 'shine with the dogs runnin'
[00:59.51]
[01:00.44]Saved by the sound of the been found
[01:03.51]Dixie whistled in the wind that'll get you Heaven bound
[01:07.05]The Devil went down to Georgia but he didn't stick around
[01:10.28]This is God's country
[01:13.68]
[01:14.61]We turn the dirt and work until the week's done
[01:17.95]We take a break and break bread on Sunday
[01:21.10]Then do it all again
[01:22.62]'Cause we're proud to be from God's country
[01:26.73]Yeah
[01:28.16]I saw the light in a sunrise
[01:30.97]Sittin' back in a 40 on the muddy riverside
[01:34.35]Gettin' baptized in holy water and 'shine with the dogs runnin'
[01:40.62]
[01:41.55]Saved by the sound of the been found
[01:44.61]Dixie whistled in the wind that'll get you Heaven bound
[01:48.28]The Devil went down to Georgia but he didn't stick around
[01:51.62]This is God's country
[01:54.97]
[02:05.87]This is God's country
[02:08.75]
[02:09.50]I don't care what my headstone reads
[02:12.31]Or what kind of pinewood box I end up in
[02:16.01]When it's my time lay me six feet deep
[02:18.70]In God's country
[02:22.02]Yeah
[02:23.04]I saw the light in a sunrise
[02:25.81]Sittin' back in a 40 on the muddy riverside
[02:29.70]Gettin' baptized in holy water and 'shine with the dogs runnin'
[02:35.50]
[02:36.34]Saved by the sound of the been found
[02:39.54]Dixie whistled in the wind that'll get you Heaven bound
[02:43.00]The Devil went down to Georgia but he didn't stick around
[02:46.58]This is God's country
[02:48.80]God's country
[02:50.20]Yeah I saw the light in a sunrise
[02:53.17]Sittin' back in a 40 on the muddy riverside
[02:57.48]Gettin' baptized in holy water and 'shine with the dogs runnin'
[03:03.80]Yeah
[03:04.06]Saved by the sound of the been found
[03:06.97]Dixie whistled in the wind that'll get you Heaven bound
[03:10.28]The Devil went down to Georgia but he didn't stick around
[03:13.95]This is God's country
[03:16.11]This is God's country
data.trans:
[ti:God's Country]
[ar:State Of Mine/Drew Jacobs]
[al:God's Country]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]以下歌词翻译由微信翻译提供
[00:09.83]//
[00:19.66]就在这座教堂小镇的外面
[00:22.54]一条黄金土路通往一片虚无
[00:25.85]我有地契但那不是我的地盘
[00:29.25]这是上帝的国度
[00:32.70]
[00:33.28]我们祈求天降甘霖在大雨倾盆时感谢上帝
[00:36.30]因为这能带来粮食和一点钱
[00:39.60]我们让一切重回正轨
[00:41.49]我想这就是他们称之为上帝之国的原因
[00:46.87]我在日出时分看到了光芒
[00:49.84]在泥泞的河边坐在40毫米口径的车里
[00:53.64]在圣水里接受洗礼与兄弟们一起奔跑
[00:59.51]
[01:00.44]被发现的声音拯救
[01:03.51]Dixie在风中呼啸让你进入天堂
[01:07.05]恶魔去了佐治亚州但他没有留下
[01:10.28]这是上帝的国度
[01:13.68]
[01:14.61]我们埋头苦干直到一周结束
[01:17.95]我们休息片刻在周日分享面包
[01:21.10]然后重蹈覆辙
[01:22.62]因为我们为自己来自上帝的国度感到骄傲
[01:26.73]//
[01:28.16]我在日出时分看到了光芒
[01:30.97]在泥泞的河边坐在40毫米口径的车里
[01:34.35]在圣水里接受洗礼与兄弟们一起奔跑
[01:40.62]
[01:41.55]被发现的声音拯救
[01:44.61]Dixie在风中呼啸让你进入天堂
[01:48.28]恶魔去了佐治亚州但他没有留下
[01:51.62]这是上帝的国度
[01:54.97]
[02:05.87]这是上帝的国度
[02:08.75]
[02:09.50]我不在乎我的墓碑上写着什么
[02:12.31]也不知道我会被关进什么样的棺材里
[02:16.01]当我的时代到来时让我躺在六英尺深的地方
[02:18.70]在上帝的国度
[02:22.02]//
[02:23.04]我在日出时分看到了光芒
[02:25.81]在泥泞的河边坐在40毫米口径的车里
[02:29.70]在圣水里接受洗礼与兄弟们一起奔跑
[02:35.50]
[02:36.34]被发现的声音拯救
[02:39.54]Dixie在风中呼啸让你进入天堂
[02:43.00]恶魔去了佐治亚州但他没有留下
[02:46.58]这是上帝的国度
[02:48.80]上帝的国度
[02:50.20]我看到了曙光乍现
[02:53.17]在泥泞的河边坐在40毫米口径的车里
[02:57.48]在圣水里接受洗礼与兄弟们一起奔跑
